attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Massive new house building and the associated infrastructure is a major contributor to global warming due to increased radiation. Man made emissions have a very limited, if any, effect and CO2 emissions are looked after by nature's thermostat, precipitation. Taxes to try and combat these emissions are just a way of raising more revenue and are detrimental to the economy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
